channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [DERBY-2716] lang.CollationTest2 failures on WEME 6.1
item.description:
The following failures were seen on J2ME WEME 6.1.
Mike said he would take a look

1) testDefaultCollation(org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.lang.CollationTest2)java.lang.NumberFormatException: J2ME Foundation Specification v1

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
committed fix for this test bug, and determined that this environment also needed to be skipped:

DERBY-2716

fixed bad parsing of java version argument. In the process also discovered
that J2ME environment also reproduces DERBY-2703, so changed the test case
to also not run in this enviroment. I just brute forced the java version
check, hopefully 2703 will get fixed before needing to add more jvm's to
ignore.
